001package io.github.kale_ko.bjsl.elements;
002
003import org.jetbrains.annotations.NotNull;
004import org.jetbrains.annotations.Nullable;
005
006/**
007 * An abstract class that all element types extend from
008 *
009 * @version 2.1.0
010 * @since 1.0.0
011 */
012public abstract class ParsedElement {
013    /**
014     * Create a new {@link ParsedElement}
015     *
016     * @since 1.0.0
017     */
018    ParsedElement() {
019    }
020
021    /**
022     * {@inheritDoc}.
023     */
024    @Override
025    public abstract @NotNull String toString();
026
027    /**
028     * {@inheritDoc}.
029     */
030    @Override
031    public abstract boolean equals(@Nullable Object obj);
032
033    /**
034     * {@inheritDoc}.
035     */
036    @Override
037    public abstract int hashCode();
038
039    /**
040     * Check if this element is a {@link ParsedObject}
041     *
042     * @return If the element is a {@link ParsedObject}
043     *
044     * @since 1.0.0
045     */
046    public boolean isObject() {
047        return this instanceof ParsedObject;
048    }
049
050    /**
051     * Check if this element is a {@link ParsedArray}
052     *
053     * @return If the element is a {@link ParsedArray}
054     *
055     * @since 1.0.0
056     */
057    public boolean isArray() {
058        return this instanceof ParsedArray;
059    }
060
061    /**
062     * Check if this element is a {@link ParsedPrimitive}
063     *
064     * @return If the element is a {@link ParsedPrimitive}
065     *
066     * @since 1.0.0
067     */
068    public boolean isPrimitive() {
069        return this instanceof ParsedPrimitive;
070    }
071
072    /**
073     * Cast this element to a {@link ParsedObject}
074     * <p>
075     * Note: Does not catch casting errors
076     *
077     * @return This element as a {@link ParsedObject}
078     *
079     * @throws java.lang.ClassCastException If this element is not an object
080     * @since 1.0.0
081     */
082    public @NotNull ParsedObject asObject() {
083        return (ParsedObject) this;
084    }
085
086    /**
087     * Cast this element to a {@link ParsedArray}
088     * <p>
089     * Note: Does not catch casting errors
090     *
091     * @return This element as a {@link ParsedArray}
092     *
093     * @throws java.lang.ClassCastException If this element is not an array
094     * @since 1.0.0
095     */
096    public @NotNull ParsedArray asArray() {
097        return (ParsedArray) this;
098    }
099
100    /**
101     * Cast this element to a {@link ParsedPrimitive}
102     * <p>
103     * Note: Does not catch casting errors
104     *
105     * @return This element as a {@link ParsedPrimitive}
106     *
107     * @throws java.lang.ClassCastException If this element is not a primitive
108     * @since 1.0.0
109     */
110    public @NotNull ParsedPrimitive asPrimitive() {
111        return (ParsedPrimitive) this;
112    }
113}
